name: SR-6
description:
A short* game for the Go Godot Game Jam 2!

Can you get Astro to safety by collecting enough energy for the ship? And if so, how fast!

  • WASD (or cursor) and SPACE (or Ctrl) to move (controller supported).
  • Run into the batteries to pick 'em up.
  • You can reach everything... if you're falling short, you just need to be a bit Wile E.

Assets from @adamatomic: https://adamatomic.itch.io/abandonauts

Music 'Don't touch the spikes' from GDM.

Code here on github.

* an MVP for something larger I had in mind, albeit life finds a way!
